Event Description:
If you need help completing your child's registration, staff will be available at your designated school on the following dates to provide support and answer any questions you may have.

For new students, please visit this webpage<https://www.rcstn.net/fs/pages/3295> to view enrollment requirements. Ensuring you have the correct documents will help make the registration process smooth and efficient.
